briefdescription.para: The extension layer converts the SBOL data model, as described in the formal specification document, into Resource Description Framework (RDF) and a standard RDF/XML file format.

detaileddescription.para: The extension interface also makes it possible to add custom application data to SBOL files, a feature intended to support workflow and collaboration between synthetic biologists at different stages of design, manufacturing, and testing of synthetic DNA constructs. All member properties of SBOL classes are themselves defined using Property classes
